title: Low carb cottage pie with celeriac topping
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 medium onion, diced', '500g minced beef (18% fat)', '1 teaspoon Gourmet Garden garlic paste', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '150g frozen garden peas', '100g carrot batons', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '2 bay leaves', '1 large celeriac (about 800g), peeled and diced', '4 tablespoons creme fraiche', '1/2 leek, diced', '75g Cathedral City grated mature Cheddar, divided', 'salt and pepper to taste']
